lead_paragraph: Ms. Jones, who died Thursday, was the last living American who was verified to have been born before 1900, and her life spanned three centuries.

headline.print_headline: A Life Lived Over 3 Centuries, Revered in a Sprawling Family
headline.main: Susannah Mushatt Jones, World’s Oldest Person, Dies in New York at 116

snippet: Ms. Jones, who died Thursday, was the last living American who was verified to have been born before 1900, and her life spanned three centuries.
abstract: Relatives of Susannah Mushatt Jones of Brooklyn, last living American verified to have been born before 1900, whose life spanned three centuries, report her death at age 116; the third of 11 children, Jones's remains will be sent back to Alabama for burial with her family.
